content: The {{organizationName}} {{productName}} MCP Server streamlines AI-driven workflows, integrating LLMs with external systems for efficient and secure document management.

comment.text: This text describes the functionality of the MCP Server, explaining how it integrates LLMs with external systems for document management. It appears as a description within the AI Settings section of the Portal Settings, specifically under the MCP Servers list. Translators should ensure the explanation of "streamlines AI-driven workflows" and "integrating LLMs" is accurately conveyed in the target language.
